About Me

My name is Aino Räkköläinen and I'm a software engineering student at LUT University.
At the moment, I am studying my second year and this website is part of my front-end course.

I'm enthuastic about learning new programming languages and technologies.
My dream is to become user-oriented software developer or front-end developer in the future.
